Name: ARC
About the game: The main goal of the game is that improving users reflex, concentration and of course to ensure the amusement. In the game you have to go through the track with characters where there are different barriers. Those barriers can be achieved with pressing the F and G key which you have to press in the appropiate time. In the game can be found evolutionary system which helps you to improve your speed, brake and life. In the game basically we start with 3 life, if you are not succeed one of the barriers, you would lose one life. There are a speed measuring zone, if you get over this section within 5 seconds, you would get one bonus point. Our level will based on how we performed in the previous game chapter.
